metadata.title: CVE-2024-57935 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix accessing invalid dip_ctx during destroying QPIf it fails to modify QP to RTR, dip_ctx will not be attached. Andduring detroying QP, the invalid dip_ctx pointer will be accessed.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
